snippet.title: Jumpala - A Puzzle/Platform/Fighter Hybrid | Coming to Steam!
snippet.description:
JUMPALA is a multiplayer competitive game that's all about strategy, superpowers, sabotage, and stage control. Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1278190/Jumpala/

** SIGN UP FOR TIPS AND STRATEGIES **
https://www.yokereba.com/jumpala/subscribe

✪ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/YokerebaGames
✪ STRATEGIES: https://www.yokereba.com/jumpala/subscribe
✪ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1278190/Jumpala/

HOW TO PLAY
Jump on platforms to turn them your color and collect points before reaching the top. Build your Special Meter to activate your character's special moves and gain the advantage. And whatever you do, don't fall off the stage!

The core mechanics are simple to learn, but hard to master. Each game is a test of skill and strategy as you try to outscore and outlive your opponents!

Up to four players, both online and local multiplayer. Whether a free-for-all, 1v1, or 2v2, you're sure to have a blast!

#Jumpala
#competitive #multiplayer #games #strategy
